pkgmetadata.longdescription: mips-sources are CVS Snapshots from the Linux-Mips.org CVS server for MIPS-Based machines

use.flag: Enables support for Cobalt Microserver hardware (Qube2/RaQ2)
Enables support for SGI Indigo2 Impact R10000 (IP28)
Enables experimental support for IP32 R10K kernels (SGI O2, 'Moosehead')
Enables use of the IP30 Impact Early Console Hack. FOR DEBUGGING ONLY!
Enables use of the IP30 Odyssey Early Console Hack. FOR DEBUGGING ONLY!
Remove binary blobs from kernel sources to provide libre license compliance.
